parameters.name: call_id

schema.description: Parameters used to decline an incoming SIP call handled by the Realtime API.

status_code.description:
SIP response code to send back to the caller. Defaults to `603` (Decline)
when omitted.

schema.title: Realtime call reject request

requestBody.description:
Provide an optional SIP status code. When omitted the API responds with
`603 Decline`.

summary: Decline an incoming SIP call by returning a SIP status code to the caller.
